name: PivotField
description: Represents a field in a PivotTable report.

properties.name: allItemsVisible
properties.description: Used to retrieve a Boolean value that indicates whether or not any manual filtering is applied to the PivotField.

properties.name: autoSortField
properties.description: Returns the name of the data field used to sort the specified PivotTable field automatically.

properties.name: autoSortOrder
properties.description: Returns the order used to sort the specified PivotTable field automatically.

properties.name: calculation
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬áPivotFieldCalculation┬ávalue that represents the type of calculation performed by the specified field. This property is valid only for data fields.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: Returns a┬áString┬ávalue that represents the label text for the pivot field.

properties.name: currentPage
properties.description: Returns or sets the current page showing for the page field (valid only for page fields).

properties.name: dataType
properties.description: Returns a┬áPivotFieldDataType┬ávalue that represents the type of data in the PivotTable field.

properties.name: drilledDown
properties.description: True┬áif the flag for the specified PivotTable field or PivotTable item is set to drilled (expanded, or visible).

properties.name: enableMultiplePageItems
properties.description: Used for specifying whether or not check boxes are present in the filter drop-down list for fields in the page area.

properties.name: formula
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬ástring┬ávalue that represents the object's formula in A1-style notation.

properties.name: aggregationFunction
properties.description: Returns or sets the function used to summarize the PivotTable field (data fields only).

properties.name: hiddenItems
properties.description: Returns an object that represents either a single hidden PivotTable item (a┬áPivotItemobject) or a collection of all the hidden items (a┬áPivotItems┬áobject) in the specified field.

properties.name: calculated
properties.description: True┬áif the PivotTable field is a calculated field or item.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬áString┬ávalue representing the name of the object.

properties.name: numberFormat
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬áString┬ávalue that represents the format code for the object.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬ávalue that represents the location of the field in the specified PivotTable report.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Returns or sets a value that represents the position of the field (first, second, third, and so on) among all the fields in its orientation (Rows, Columns, Pages, Data).

properties.name: showDetail
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the specified┬áPivotField┬áis showing detail.

properties.name: sourceName
properties.description: Returns a┬ástring┬ávalue that represents the specified objectΓÇÖs name as it appears in the original source data for the specified PivotTable report.

properties.name: subtotals
properties.description: Returns or sets subtotals displayed with the specified field. Valid only for nondata fields.

properties.name: visiblePivotItems
properties.description: Returns an object that represents either a single visible PivotTable item (a┬áPivotItemobject) or a collection of all the visible items (a┬áPivotItems┬áobject) in the specified field.

properties.name: pivotItems
properties.description: Returns an object that represents either a single PivotTable item (a┬áPivotItem┬áobject) or a collection of all the visible and hidden items (a┬áPivotItems┬áobject) in the specified field.

methods.name: getDataRange
methods.description: Returns a┬áRange┬áobject that represents the range of the current PivotField.

methods.name: autoGroup
methods.description: Automatically groups the pivot fields in a pivot table.

methods.name: autoSort
methods.description: Establishes automatic field-sorting rules for PivotTable reports.

parameters.name: Field
parameters.description: The name of the sort key field. You must specify the unique name, and not the displayed name.

methods.name: clearAllFilters
methods.description: Calling this method deletes all filters currently applied to the PivotField. This includes deleting all filters from the┬áPivotFilters┬ácollection of the PivotField and removing any manual filtering applied to the PivotField as well. If the PivotField is in the Report Filter area, the item selected will be set to the default item.
